effect.twilightdelight.aurora_glowing.de: Make yourself glow with rainbow color. All entities appear rainbow glowing to you
effect.twilightdelight.fire_range.desc: Ignite enemies around you, and make you cannot be ignited.
effect.twilightdelight.frozen_range.desc: Freeze enemies around you, and make you immune to Frosty. Can also freeze items.
effect.twilightdelight.poison_range.desc: Poison enemies around you, and make you immune to Poison.
Reduce movement speed and attack damage.
twilightdelight.configuration.effectRang: Range for hostile effects, such as fire/frost/poison
twilightdelight.configuration.title: Twilight Flavors & Delight Configuration
twilightdelight.title: Twilight Flavors & Delight
